intent_atoms.description: Integrate ResearchLogMonitor audit into SwiftUI previews so designers can see diagnostics during design-time validation.
SwiftUI preview compositions must consume ResearchLogPreviewProvider snapshots and run ResearchLogMonitor.audit against bundled VR-006 fixtures.
Diagnostics for ready, missing, and schema mismatch states must appear in ResearchLogAuditPreview matching the monitoring checklist.
ResearchLogMonitor.audit must always execute when preview scenarios render VR-006 research log data.
Use ResearchLogPreviewProvider snapshots through preview compositions to provide sample payloads and diagnostics alongside previews.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogPreviewProvider snapshots
functional_units.description: Provides SwiftUI preview compositions that render VR-006 research log data and run ResearchLogMonitor.audit to surface schema drift, missing fixtures, and empty payloads during design-time validation.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogAuditPreview diagnostics display
functional_units.description: Displays diagnostics for ready, missing, and schema mismatch states alongside sample payloads in SwiftUI previews.

functional_units.name: Canonical VR-006 fixture management
functional_units.description: Maintains canonical VR-006 fixtures and provides mismatch/missing variants for regression visibility in preview compositions.

functional_units.name: Schema change refresh process documentation
functional_units.description: Documents the process for refreshing preview fixtures when schema fields change to keep designers unblocked.
